      • getBestsAnts

        public java.util.List<Ant> getBestsAnts()
        Get a list containing the ants used to generate the next generation of the population
        Returns:
        a list of the ants that had the best behaviour regarding survivability

      • nextGeneration

        public Score nextGeneration(World world)
        Generate the next generation of ants using the best ants of the current generation
        Parameters:
        world - the world in which you will generate the new ants
        Returns:
        Return a Score object containing the information of the last generation

        Return a population from a saved file, complete with position and decision trees
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a population characterized by the file

      • getAsElement

        public org.w3c.dom.Element getAsElement(org.w3c.dom.Document document)

        Returns:
